title: Darius forge
body: In a game i encountered a darius that at the champ name spot had darius forge. I don't think he had a skin or chroma and his champ splash art was the same so can someone tell me what it was. I have a really bad quality picture if anyone wants to see it.

replies.body:
Forge is the name of the chromas for his base skin. They don't change the splash art so you'll only see it in-game. Those chromas were some of the real early ones so they aren't super distinct.

https://i.imgur.com/a95X3lK.png?noredirect
I was confused cause I didn't really look when i was in game i just saw the exact same splash art and the in-game champ looked basically the same.
